headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. If you haven't migrated the leads of the ad account to a Business Center via /page/library/transfer/ , specify the advertiser_id . If you have migrated the leads of the ad account to a Business Center via /page/library/transfer/ , specify the library_id . Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: library_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either advertiser_id or library_id has to be set. If you haven't migrated the leads of the ad account to a Business Center via /page/library/transfer/ , specify the advertiser_id . If you have migrated the leads of the ad account to a Business Center via /page/library/transfer/ , specify the library_id . Form library ID. To obtain the IDs of form libraries that you can access, use /page/library/get/ .

parameters.name: ad_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either ad_id or page_id has to be set. If you specify ad_id , you will create a lead download task for a specific ad. If you specify page_id , you will create a lead download task for a specific Instant Form. Ad ID. Specify the ID of an ad that uses an Instant Form to collect leads. To learn about how to create such ads, see Create a Lead Generation ad with optimization location as Instant Form . To obtain the IDs of ads within an ad account, use /ad/get/ .

parameters.name: page_id Conditional
parameters.description: Either ad_id or page_id has to be set. If you specify ad_id , you will create a lead download task for a specific ad. If you specify page_id , you will create a lead download task for a specific Instant Form. Instant form ID. To obtain the IDs of Instant Forms within an ad account, use /page/get/ and set business_type to LEAD_GEN .

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: Task ID. If you do not pass in this field, the request will create a lead download task and you will get the task_id in the response. If you pass in this field, the request will poll the task status to check whether the task has been completed ( status = SUCCEED ).

examples.title: Create a lead download task for an Instant Form within a form library (EEA/CH/UK region)
Create a lead download task for an ad (US region)
Create a lead download task for an Instant Form within an ad account (other countries/regions)
Query the status of a lead download task for an Instant Form within a form library (EEA/CH/UK region)

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Return code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Return message. For details, see Appendix-Return codes .

fields.name: status
fields.description: Task status. Enum values: CREATED , FAILED , RUNNING , SUCCEED

fields.name: task_id
fields.description: Task ID. You can pass in task_id in the request to poll the task status to check whether the task has been completed ( status = SUCCEED ).

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Returned only when status is SUCCEED . File name of the lead file.

fields.name: file_type
fields.description: Returned only when status is SUCCEED . File type of the lead file. Enum values: csv , zip .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: Log id of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.
